markdown.content: @staff I know this might sound like a very weird request, but can you guys make it so that I can buy cohost plus months instead of or alongside subscribing? I'm coming from tetr.io, instead of paying 5 euro a month it's buying one month for 5 euro, so people can buy in advance in bulk. I want to have the peace of mind that I can spend $10 to support cohost without worrying that I forgot to cancel. I know you guys are using stripe and I don't think stripe support like a one time payment donation but I hate subscribing to stuff and I think a lot of people also think the same
